name: FCEUX 2 Movie Capture File
summary: Learn about .FM2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You will most likely only encounter FM2 files when capturing gameplay of an NES or Famicom game with the FCEUX emulator. When you open an FM2 file in FCEUX, the emulator reads the button data plays it back to recreate the gameplay.
To create an FM2 file with FCEUX, follow these steps:
Open the game ROM you are going to emulate in FCEUX
Name the FM2 file and click "Start"
To open an FM2 file with FCEUX, follow these steps:
Navigate to the FM2 file and select it
NOTE: FCEUX is an advanced version of the FCE Ultra emulator. It is designed to provide functions from different FCE Ultra branches, such as FCEU rerecording, FCEUXD, and FCEUXDSP.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
